uk.ac.susx.mlcl.lib.io
Interface WritableCharChannel

All Superinterfaces:
Channel, Closeable
All Known Subinterfaces:
CharChannel
All Known Implementing Classes:
CharFileChannel
public interface WritableCharChannel
extends Channel

A channel that can write chars.

Author:
Hamish Morgan <hamish.morgan@sussex.ac.uk>

Method Summary
 int write(CharBuffer src)
          Writes a sequence of chars to this channel from the given buffer.
 
Methods inherited from interface java.nio.channels.Channel
close, isOpen
 

Method Detail

write

int write(CharBuffer src)
          throws NonWritableChannelException,
                 ClosedChannelException,
                 AsynchronousCloseException,
                 ClosedByInterruptException,
                 IOException
Writes a sequence of chars to this channel from the given buffer.

Parameters:
src - buffer from which bytes are to be retrieved
Returns:
number of bytes written, possibly zero
Throws:
NonWritableChannelException - - If this channel was not opened for writing
ClosedChannelException - - If this channel is closed
AsynchronousCloseException - - If another thread closes this channel while the write operation is in progress
ClosedByInterruptException - - If another thread interrupts the current thread while the write operation is in progress, thereby closing the channel and setting the current thread's interrupt status
IOException - - If some other I/O error occurs
